title: why are afker not getting punished more then the 4 other teamates...
body: Why doesn't the one afking get punish more than the teammate. 5 of my last  8 game had people with sky high ping which they ended up just leaving the game all together. Why is there absolutely no different punishment for them compared to the punishment i get for being in plat and in the past when  i was bronze silver gold

replies.body:
There is specific punishment for afkers and leavers.

It is called being banned if it persists.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QEoxAKZT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-08T02:17:22.115+0000)
>
> There is specific punishment for afkers and leavers.
> 
> It is called being banned if it persists.

Not really, afkers are automatically handled by leave buster and the harshest punishment it can give it low priority Q for a few games if you're constantly leaving.

The only case you'd ever get banned for afk is if you fed, got toxic in chat, then d/cd, then it's a reportable ragequit.
